Endpoint

Supported Profile(s):

  • National Directory API Endpoint Profile

Behavior

Versioning support: Versioned

Reference policy: Literal References, Local References Only

Interactions

Name Conformance Description
  search-type SHALL

Search all resources of the specified type based on some filter criteria.
  read SHALL

Read the current state of the resource
  create SHALL

Create a new resource with a server assigned id
  update SHALL

Update an existing resource by its id or create it if it is new
  vread SHALL

Read the state of a specific version of the resource
  history-instance SHALL

Retrieve the history of the resource
  history-type SHALL

Retrieve the history of the resource type

Search

Supported Includes: Endpoint:organization

Supported Reverse-Includes: CareTeam:endpoint, HealthcareService:endpoint, InsurancePlan:endpoint, Location:endpoint, Location:endpoint, Organization:endpoint, OrganizationAffiliation:endpoint, Practitioner:endpoint, PractitionerRole:endpoint

Parameter Name Definition Conformance Type Description

Endpoint trust framework type

Endpoint dynamic registration trust profile

Endpoint access control mechanism

Endpoint connection type version

Endpoint ihe connection type

Endpoint verification status

supports a more sophisticated grammar for searching
_id _id SHALL Token

Logical id allows to retrive more than one in a single call
_lastUpdated _lastUpdated SHALL Date/DateTime

Allows filtering for only records that have changed since last query.

Connection type
identifier identifier SHALL Token

Endpoint identifier

status status SHALL Token

searchParam.documentation: The list of healthcare services that this worker provides for this role's Organization/Location

searchParam.name: specialty
searchParam.documentation: The practitioner has this specialty at an organization

resource.documentation: Verification Resource, supportedProfile, interaction, search parameter

interaction.documentation: Create a new resource with a server assigned id
Update an existing resource by its id or create it if it is new
Read the current state of the resource
Search all resources of the specified type based on some filter criteria.
Read the state of specific version of the resource
Retrieve the history of the resource
Retrieve the history of the resource type

searchParam.name: _filter
searchParam.documentation: supports a more sophisticated grammar for searching

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: Logical id allows to retrive more than one in a single call

searchParam.name: _lastUpdated
searchParam.documentation: Allows filtering for only records that have changed since last query.
